response.original_title: The World of Little Bear - New Friends
response.overview: Baby Raccoon, Mighty the whale and friendly little snake called No Feet! These are just some of the new friends waiting to meet Little Bear. Whether he's helping Mother Bear, taking bath or just playing, Little Bear's world is full of wonderful surprises. From a mermaid to a moose, there's no end to the fun that comes when new friends meet in The World of Little Bear!
response.title: The World of Little Bear - New Friends
